text: <@U02HAJ6JF> Are you still having problems w/ SASS/Compass  compilation and the beer animations?
haven't been working on it, jenny pushed the changes and all seems to be working, did you notice something?
No, but I have some free time and really trying to figure out cause of this bug so we don't need to bug Jenny/Scott to push client-side stuff.
<@U02618EV1> would it help you to have a list of my gems and their versions?
Ultimately, I think we need to find the code that doesn't seem to work with newer library versions and fix that.
But I want to be able to at list compile a working site for now and worry about the other stuff later.

[smallbatch-frontend/dev] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/smallbatch-frontend/commits/f1218cfe3e1f4060ca8faca66324fca6dfe5b8d8|f1218cfe3e1f>: Freeing ourselves from the shackles of Compass.
 - Gaston Figueroa

<!channel> I removed Compass from the this project but I pushed the changes to a dev branch for now. If we happen to work again on this project we should start from there and do some additional tests to make sure everything is working as expected.
